title: Ticket #14: gridmanager should check for gsi support
description: if a user's job is going to require gsi support condor_submit will do a check_x509_proxy to discover if gsi is available and the proxy is valid. the gridmanager does no such check. the result is if a user is doing a remote submit the local condor_submit may have gsi support while the remote condor_gridmanager does not. the result may be confusing.
remarks:
